reasoning: Acute condition with incidence reported from Swedish nationwide register study (2009-2018) showing ~110 per 100k person-years in males and ~49 per 100k in females. Using male rate as global estimate. Alcohol intoxication is most frequent alcohol-related disorder in emergency care settings. Confidence limited by year-specific data and gender variation.
source: Swedish nationwide register study documenting alcohol-related disorders incidence 2009-2018
